---
title: "Mega flapjack"
author: "Jack Kennedy"
categories: [bars]
description: "A Kennedy classic, for fueling bike rides"
---

- 250g jumbo oats
- 125g butter
- 125g light brown sugar
- 3 tbsp golden syrup
- handful of raisins / sultanas (optional)

1. Melt butter in pan
1. Add sugar and mix until disolved
1. Add golden syrup, raisins and oats
1. Mix well, transfer to lined tray
1. Bake at 180C fan for 12 min
